question.title: How should handle the calenders on phptravel.net website ? How can make generic function for it?
question.body:
I am practising the selenium webdriver with java. I am trying to automate the hotel booking process. currently stuck at handling the calenders or datepicker on the page.I tried various approches, but can't reach to the final result. It would be helpful, if anyone suggest good approch.

https://phptravels.net/ > Hotels > Checkin calender

Using page object model so created sepearate class of homepage

Homepage.java

   //Get default selected CheckIn Date which is at the value attribute
public String getPreSelectedCheckInDate() {
    waitUtils.waitForElementToBeVisible(checkInDateSelector);
    return checkInDateSelector.getAttribute("value");
}

//Get current month and year at header
public String getCurrentMonthYear() {
    clickOnCheckIn();
    return generic.getCurrentCalenderHeader(currentMonthYearLocater);
}


public void clickOnCurrentYear() {
    WebElement monthYear = driver.findElement(currentMonthYearLocater);
    waitUtils.waitForElementToBeVisible(monthYear);
    monthYear.click();
}

stuck here that, is this is right approch ? or else use another one.

made a class for generic actions.

Generic.java

  //generic method to get current header of calender
public String getCurrentCalenderHeader(By currenHeaderLocater) {
    WebElement currentHeader = driver.findElement(currenHeaderLocater); 
    waitUtil.waitForElementToBeVisible(currentHeader);
    return currentHeader.getText();
}
